W3C XML 签名语法和处理标准不允许空`Manifest`标记。The W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing standard does not allow empty `Manifest` tags. 开放打包约定规范的要求也-特定`Object`标记，其中同时包含`Manifest`和`SignatureProperties`标记。Also the Open Packaging Conventions specification requires a -specific `Object` tag that contains both `Manifest` and `SignatureProperties` tags. 每个`Manifest`标记另外还包括至少一个`Reference`标记。Each `Manifest` tag additionally also include at least one `Reference` tag. 这些标记要求每个签名对至少一个（非空部分标记） 或(非空`relationshipSelectors`) 即使签名只需登录`signatureObjects`或`objectReferences`。These tags require that each signature sign at least one (non-empty parts tag) or (non-empty `relationshipSelectors`) even if the signature is needed only to sign `signatureObjects` or `objectReferences`. 这方法将忽略属性与每个关联中定义`objectReferences`。This method ignores the property associated with each defined in `objectReferences`. 这重载提供了支持的代[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]需要自定义的签名`Object`标记。This overload provides support for generation of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] signatures that require custom `Object` tags. 对于所提供的`Object`标记进行签名，相应`Reference`必须与提供标记[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，它指定`Object`本地片段语法中的标记。For any provided `Object` tag to be signed, a corresponding `Reference` tag must be provided with a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the `Object` tag in local fragment syntax. 例如如果`Object`标记的 ID 为"myObject"，在 URI`Reference`标记是"#myObject"。For example if the `Object` tag has an ID of "myObject", the URI in the `Reference` tag would be "#myObject". 对于未签名的对象，不`Reference`是必需的。For unsigned objects, no `Reference` is required.
